text: Defeat the enemy to win the battle! Reduce their HP to zero to defeat them.
The enemy is attacking! This shows information about the enemy's attack.
Each card has a block value on the bottom left. Select cards from your hand to assign them to block incoming damage.
Some quests have tribulation effects. These effects are triggered at the start of the battle and can be beneficial or detrimental. Hover over this icon to see the effect(s).
